text: High Crimes is a 2002 American legal thriller movie directed by Carl Franklin and starring Ashley Judd, Morgan Freeman, Jim Caviezel, Amanda Peet, Tom Bower. The screenplay by Yuri Zeltser and Grace Cary Bickley is based on the 1998 novel of the same name by Joseph Finder and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * * * * * Category:2002 thriller movies Category:American legal movies Category:American thriller movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Carl Franklin
title: High Crimes
